description: This file is a Bitbake recipe (.inc) for building the 'runc' container CLI tool, defining build instructions, dependencies, configuration options, and install procedures.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configuration step that sets up environment variables and build options based on configuration flags.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compilation step that sets GOPATH, creates symbolic links, and compiles the runc binary.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installation step that copies the built binary and creates symlinks in the target directory.
